name: EXE Corp
description:
Founded in March 2009, EXE Corp specializes in providing outstanding IT solutions in the manner that best serves business needs. We are young people with the desire to help businesses adapt to the transformation of the world. We strive to be a companion, an insider and a loyal friend to every client.
Our service includes software development, mobile solution and production support. During our expedition, we have had the privilege of serving more than 200 clients from many parts of the world: Canada, US, Australia, Vietnam, and numerous other countries. Our aspiration is to be among the most prestigious and reliable IT outsourcing brands worldwide.
READ MORE...
